name: Glitchy Escape
description:
This is a puzzle-platformer game with glitches. You can pass the level with using glitch or normal puzzle solve.

Controls:

Use "W, A, S, D" to move.

Use "E" for press buttons and take objects.

Use "Space" for jump.

Use "Shift" for sprint.

Use "R" for reset level.

Use "Mouse1, Ctrl" for fire the gun.
